item.title: Kami add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kami add a quote by Raymond Chandler
item.description: "Alcohol is like love. The first kiss is magic, the second is intimate, the third is routine. After that you take the girl's clothes off." -- Raymond Chandler

item.title: Kami add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "There is only one thing in the world worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kami add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kami add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Yes: I am a dreamer. For a dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kami add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The only difference between saints and sinners is that every saint has a past while every sinner has a future. " -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kami add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Kami add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Alcohol, taken in sufficient quantities, may produce all the effects of drunkenness." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kami add a quote by Mortimer J. Adler
item.description: "In the case of good books, the point is not to see how many of them you can get through, but rather how many can get through to you." -- Mortimer J. Adler

item.title: Kami add a quote by Rudyard Kipling
item.description: "Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind." -- Rudyard Kipling

item.title: Kami add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "Great heroes need great sorrows and burdens, or half their greatness goes unnoticed. It is all part of the fairy tale." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Kami add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Kami add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kami add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kami add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kami add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "Curiosity is, in great and generous minds, the first passion and the last." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: Kami add a quote by Arthur Cleveland Coxe
item.description: "Tis the nightâ€”the night Of the grave's delight, And the warlocks are at their play; Ye think that without, The wild winds shout, But no, it is theyâ€”it is they!" -- Arthur Cleveland Coxe

item.title: Kami add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "He stepped down, trying not to look long at her, as if she were the sun, yet he saw her, like the sun, even without looking." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Kami add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "I always loved you, and if one loves anyone, one loves the whole person, just as they are and not as one would like them to be. -Dolly" -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Kami add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Kami add a quote by Jeremy Aldana
item.description: "Pain will leave you, when you let go" -- Jeremy Aldana

item.title: Kami add a quote by Jeremy Aldana
item.description: "Itâ€™s not so much the journey thatâ€™s important; as is the way that we treat those we encounter and those around us, along the way" -- Jeremy Aldana

item.title: Kami add a quote by Jeremy Aldana
item.description: "Each time a man looks into your eyes, he is only searching to find himself; for he knows already, that he is part of you" -- Jeremy Aldana

item.title: Kami add a quote by Jeremy Aldana
item.description: "Seems to me that there is a fine line between insanity and dedicationâ€¦I call that line commitment" -- Jeremy Aldana

item.title: Kami add a quote by Jeremy Aldana
item.description: "Sometimes the best advice comes from those whom you least expectâ€¦therefore take no one for granted" -- Jeremy Aldana

item.title: Kami add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "â€ŽLife is a shipwreck, but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats." -- Voltaire

item.title: Kami add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "To love. To be loved. To never forget your own insignificance. To never get used to the unspeakable violence and the vulgar disparity of life around you. To seek joy in the saddest places. To pursue beauty to its lair. To never simplify what is complicated or complicate what is simple. To respect strength, never power. Above all, to watch. To try and understand. To never look away. And never, never to forget." -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Kami add a quote by William Arthur Ward
item.description: "The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails." -- William Arthur Ward

item.title: Kami add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Kami add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane." -- Philip K. Dick
